types.html:
faire un enfant dans le dos

  1. to trick someone into making one pregnant, to get pregnant without one's partner knowledge or consent
  2. (figuratively) to do something behind someone's back
trans: to trick someone into making one pregnant, to get pregnant without one's partner knowledge or consent
to do something behind someone's back

title: faire un enfant dans le dos
